    • How to print the current page

    How to print the current page¶

    Example add to tag¶

    <html>
   <head>

      <style type="css">
        .print_web_page{
        background-color:red;
        width:400px;
        height:400px;
        }
      </style>

   </head>

   <body>

      <div class="print_web_page" onclick="window.print();"></div>

   </body>
</html>

    Example add to head¶

    <html>
   <head>

      <style type="css">
        .print_web_page{
        background-color:red;
        width:400px;
        height:400px;
        }
      </style>
      <script>
        function print_web_page(){
                window.print();
        }
      </script>

   </head>

   <body>

      <div class="print_web_page" onclick="print_web_page();">Print</div>

   </body>
</html>

    Resource¶
